column4: I was wondering if someone could help me with an issue I'm having with K3D. I'm trying to burn a DVD ISO and after it burns, it fails verification due to the disc that was just burned being different to the original iso. I'm burning as slow as I can to avoid errors using DAO method. Has anyone got any suggestions as to what could be wrong?
are there any other apps I can use instead?
If you are burning an iso have you tried right click on it and send to disk
